content: I have spent significant time in the last several months with a number of customers and my view is that todayâs economic environment is likely to accelerate programmatic growth as publishers seek greater operational efficiencies to the alternatively high-costs of managing a traditional, insertion order-based business. Now turning to our operational strength which gives us several significant levers in our business that allow us to maintain 30% plus annual adjusted EBITDA margins, generate healthy cash flows and invest for continued long-term growth in an expanding addressable market.
